swapElement.title: Eternl Monster Swap
swapElement.subline: Grabs the best price from multiple aggregators for you

dexFees.label: Batcher & Pool Volume fee (DEXs)
dexFees.info: DEXs set a fee to process your order. This is not refundable.

aggregatorFee.label: Service fee
aggregatorFee.info: This is the convenience fee. It helps funding the development of the aggregator and Eternl.

deposit.label: Refundable deposit
deposit.info: A deposit is required to process your order. This amount is returned to your wallet with the tokens you receive.

slippage.title: Swap Slippage
slippage.subline: Slippage on swaps is the difference between expected and executed trade prices.

warning.headline: High Slippage
warning.text: Having high slippage on swaps can result in substantially lower returns. Please read up on slippage for AMM orders before you continue.

blocklist.title: Enabled Protocols
blocklist.subline: A disabled DEX won't be used for swaps

aggregators.title: Enabled Aggregators
aggregators.subline: Disabled aggregators will not be used for swaps

openOrders.title: Open - Your orders
openOrders.subline: Displays on-chain open swap orders not yet processed.

marketOrders.title: Market orders
marketOrders.subline: Watch orders arriving on-chain in real time.
